bug.short_desc: New Component for ReMo website bugs

assigned_to.name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

long_desc.thetext:
To the "Mozilla Reps" Product, please add a "Website" component.
This product/component will be used to track defects with the reps.mozilla.org website.

Thanks!
When I go to file a bug, I don't see "Mozilla Reps" from the enter bugs for or the change several bugs flow.
If this product is a hidden one, can we remove the "Websites" component and create product=Websites component=reps.mozilla.org
Sorry for the trouble and thanks for your help.

Yes the product is a private one at the moment.
Pierros, can you comment on the above question?
Dave

It makes sense for "Mozilla Reps" to remain private. Automated systems file bugs there.
It was my mistake to put websites under there (didn't know private products were possible).

Should I remove the Website component before any bugs are associated with it and add the component to Websites?
Dave

Remove the component and add a new component under mozilla.org product with the name : reps.mozilla.org (or Mozilla Reps).
That should be used to track any issues and development of Mozilla Reps website
Unfortunately bugzilla does not offers us control over visibility per component so we need to go this way to resolve the issue.
Thanks!

(In reply to comment #5) > Should I remove the Website component before any bugs are associated with it and add the component to Websites?
Yes, please.
(In reply to comment #6) > Remove the component and add a new component under mozilla.org product with the name : reps.mozilla.org (or Mozilla Reps).
No, please use the "Websites" product, not the "mozilla.org" product.

(In reply to comment #6) > Unfortunately bugzilla does not offers us control over visibility per component > so we need to go this way to resolve the issue.
Sure it does, especially with the use of the custom create form.
